description: Flasher is a flashlight app that lets you see your way in the dark better with your phone! There is also a rapid flash mode that lets you choose from 7 colors, including a rainbow mode! Imagine you need to get someones attention, or someone is trying to find you in a crowd, you could set the app to Flash, hold in it the air, and tell the person to look for the flashing phone. Flasher also features a panic mode. The phone will emit a loud alarm sound and flash red rapidly. You never know when you will need to get someones attention, or when you will need a light to guide your path!
